p: Fern et al. [ 127] reported that, other than diuretic, P. pyrifolium is also used as a depurative. A decoction of P. pyrifolium is applied to treat stomatitis in young children, and also to treat blennorrhagia. On the other hand, the fruits are febrifuge and stomachic, and are also used in the treatment of blennorrhagia while the stem internodes of P. pyrifolium are used in the treatment of asthma and neuralgia.
